page.shortlink: api a5 storage list items function
page.description: Gets a list of items in a storage container, including listing files stored in Amazon S3 or Azure. You can optionally return objects that start with the specified searchPrefix.

argument.name: connectionString
argument.description: Storage connection string with ::storage:: as a prefix.

argument.name: searchPrefix
argument.description: Default = "". An optional search prefix. If specified, only items that begin with the search prefix will be returned.

argument.name: pResult
argument.description: An optional dot variable that you can pass in that will be populated with information about the object.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns the list of items. If a search prefix was specified, returns the list of items that begin with the search prefix.

page.example:
dim storageConn as c = "::storage::AmazonS3" dim items as c dim properties as p items = a5Storage_listItems(storageConn, "ReleaseNotes/button", properties)
? properties = hasError = .F. timeTakenMilliseconds = 144
? line_count(items) = 23
? items = ReleaseNotes/button-list-fill-width-property.jpg ReleaseNotes/button-list-fill.jpg ReleaseNotes/button-list-properties.jpg ReleaseNotes/button-listbuilder.jpg ReleaseNotes/button1shown.gif ReleaseNotes/button2hiddenpreserve.gif ReleaseNotes/buttonListExamples.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttonListTabs.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttonList_tabs_inbuilder.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttonListallowNull.gif ReleaseNotes/buttonListclassname.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttonListcontrolbar.gif ReleaseNotes/buttonSplit2.jpg ReleaseNotes/button_toggle_2stateOff.gif ReleaseNotes/button_toggle_2stateOn.gif ReleaseNotes/button_togglepropsheet.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttonlistfillwidth.gif ReleaseNotes/buttonlistfillwidth2.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttons2.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttonsubtheme1.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttonsubtheme2.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttonsubthemes.jpg ReleaseNotes/buttonsubthemes1.jpg
